section.title: Installation Requirements
section.para: You can run Pardus on an average x86 compatible hardware. We suggest to use at least 512 MB RAM (memory) and a 1400 MHz processor to get a good performance. Minimum and recommended hardware requirements for Pardus 2011 are mentioned below:

listitem.para: 450 MHz Intel or AMD processor (1000 MHz recommended)
At least 4 GB of free hard disk space (10 GB recommended)
